answers.author: Josephine Lee
answers.text:
Dear Miss Presensky, 
My name is Josephine Lee, assistant program manager in the international department at ICMA. A couple months ago, I conducted preliminary research on CPTED use in the United States for our CPTED project in Honduras under our newest award, the USAID City Links program. 
According to the 2008 publication "21st Century Security and CPTED" , cities that have exemplified CPTED Codes and Resolutions include
Tempe, AZ
Broward County, FL
Sarasota, FL
Tampa, FL
Orlando, FL
Ann Arbor, MI
p. 201 of http://www.amazon.com/21st-Century-Security-CPTED-Infrastructure/dp/1420068075 
I also found articles on North Miami Beach CPTED programs that may interest you. 
http://www.citynmb.com/index.asp?Type=B_BASIC&SEC={C0684001-F01D-47A6-B404-11DC7AF3FE13}&DE={7A289D63-11B4-4F16-83B3-91C8E05259E8} 
Press- http://miami.cbslocal.com/2011/03/23/police-prevent-crime-with-environmental-design/
Miami, Florida Presentation: http://cpted-security.com/atlas/index2.php?option=com_docman&task=doc_view&gid=43&Itemid=63 
There is also a professional CPTED association in Florida that may serve as a  resource  http://www.fldoca.com/ 
Please let me know how I can further assist you. Because of ICMA's current work in CPTED, we'd also love to hear the results of your findings  and we'll be sure to keep you informed when we find more information.

author: Charlotte Presensky
text: Currently our City conducts a review with a fee for the Police Departments CPTED review during the planning and construction process.  We are looking for examples of other City's that have this type of review and the associated costs, if any.  Any examples would be helpful.
title: CPTED Plan Review
